laboratory_examinations.findings: Persistent mural thickening of a 10 cm segment of sigmoid colon with regional and adjacent diverticula in the left lower quadrant, with associated exuberant fat stranding. A 5 x 6 cm ill-defined confluent area of hypoattenuation, consistent with a phlegmon or evolving abscess. This has significantly increased in size since four days ago.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The size of the phlegmon has significantly increased in size since four days ago.
